name: IDEA LAB Wordpress boilerplate theme
body:
### Installation
```
$ cd /wp-content/themes/your-project/
$ git clone git@github.com:kfeldmanis/idealab-wp-boilerplate.git .
$ compass watch /wp-content/themes/your-project/assets/
```

### Required tools
Compass - http://compass-style.org/

### Default theme options
```
Appearance -> Theme Options
```
* meta_author
* meta_google_webmaster
* meta_google_analytics
* social_twitter_username

More info: [https://github.com/devinsays/options-framework-plugin](https://github.com/devinsays/options-framework-plugin)

### Contributors
[kfeldmanis](https://github.com/kfeldmanis), [cherijs](https://github.com/cherijs)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
